labels.label:
This flow is used to load Dunkin store terminal data (JSON) to DB Algorithm is given below -
1. Read Rest Web services. 2. Process it according to requirement. 3. Required Validation. 4. Data Transformation & Insertion into persistent store. 4.1 Update duplicate data.
